item.title: Keiko Before the 8th Taikai
item.description: Dear members The schedule of KEIKO before the 8th Taikai at Esaka dojo Matsudo November 2nd, 2019 (sat) 5pm〜7pm November 3rd, 2019 (sun) 1pm〜3pm World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: Kamata Early Summer Seminar2019
item.description: We held “Kamata early summer seminar2019” at June 23. Keiko Shinsa Ceremony awards Other pics are in here. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: About the 8th Taikai
item.description: Dear members We decided to hold that “World MJER Iaido Federation 10th anniversary, The 8th Taikai” at 4th November, 2019. at Tokyo Jitsugyo high school. O-ta, Tokyo Japan. We will countact you with the details later. Our event schedule World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: Kamata Winter Seminar2019
item.description: We held “Kamata winter seminar2019” at February 24. An inaugural ceremony Three persons have been appointed to new official instructor from Esaka sensei. Practice overview World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟
